†Ctenodipteri Pander 1856: 79 (family) †
Ctenodus Agassiz 1838
[also seen as †Ctenodipterini Pander 1857: 1 ; no stem of the type genus, not available, Art. 11.7.1.1]

†Cténodiptériens Eichwald 1860: 1534 (family) †
Ctenodus Agassiz 1838
[published not in latinized form before 1900, not available, Art. 11.7.2]

†Ctenododipteridae Günther 1880: 359 (family)? †
Ctenodus Agassiz 1838
[no stem of the type genus, not available, Art. 11.7.1.1]

(family) †
